allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser -Force; Invoke-RestMethod -Uri https://get.scoop.sh | Invoke-Expression")
Bash(timeout 30 bash -c 'until docker-compose logs db 2>&1 | grep -q ""database system is ready to accept connections""; do sleep 1; done && echo ""Database is ready!""')
Bash(timeout 30 bash -c 'until docker-compose logs db 2>&1 | grep -q ""database system is ready to accept connections""; do sleep 1; done && echo ""Database ready!""')
